privacyCash.keyVulnerability: Amounts visible on-chain enable correlation attacks. 16.4% of withdrawals linked to deposits.

shadowWire.keyVulnerability: Bulletproofs hide amounts but addresses are plaintext visible. 50.5% have both sender and recipient exposed.

silentSwap.keyVulnerability: Wallets that both send and receive through SilentSwap are linkable. 12.3% exposure rate.

summary.recommendation: SilentSwap provides the best privacy (66 score, 12.3% linkable) via cross-chain routing. Privacy Cash (84 score, 16.4% linkable) and ShadowWire (48 score, 50.5% linkable) both have significant vulnerabilities.
summary.methodology: Analysis based on on-chain data. Privacy Cash attacked via timing+amount correlation. ShadowWire addresses directly visible. SilentSwap attacked via round-trip wallet detection.
